urls.title: Jason Robertson is 23, Filipino-American, and #1 in NHL Goals (Pablo is Excited)
urls.description: Listen to this episode from ESPN Daily on Spotify. You may be familiar with some of the NHL’s biggest stars. Names like Sidney Crosby, Alexander Ovechkin, and Connor McDavid have transcended the sport…but there’s a new star in Dallas who is currently rising above ALL of them. Jason Robertson is a 23-year-old winger for the Dallas Stars, leads the NHL in goals…and is in the conversation for MVP. So we called in our old friend Emily Kaplan, and she tells us everything about hockey’s latest phenom…including why he’s now Pablo’s favorite hockey player. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

tweets.text:
New #ESPNDaily:

🚨🇵🇭 THE 23-YEAR-OLD LEADING THE NHL IN SCORING IS A FILIPINO-AMERICAN MVP CANDIDATE NAMED JASON ROBERTSON 🇵🇭🚨

So @emilymkaplan takes us inside the story of my new favorite hockey player of all time (and the RV his family grew up in)

🎧 https://t.co/MgmiBsOV15 https://t.co/nDRez36tUI

@TyFromMN @wyshynski I believe by *distributed* Greg is implying this includes comps where whether those seats are filled or not they are factored into the announced number. Deceiving but that's how it goes.
@wyshynski Wysh, where can I find your response? Is your mail bag written or on a pod?!
I've seen some NHL attendance conjecture in the timeline today, so just a reminder: The NHL announces tickets *distributed* as the attendance figure at each game, not an actual turnstile count.
